src:
Piala Dunia U-20 2021 Jadi Tantangan Pengurus PSSI yang Baru
02 Nov 2019, 19:55 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Wakil Ketua Umum PSSI terpilih, Cucu Sumantri, membeberkan sejumlah program yang akan dijalankan empat tahun ke depan. Dia mengatakan bahwa semuanya tetap berpatokan terhadap road map yang telah disusun.
Namun, salah satu yang menjadi tantangan bagi kepengurusan PSSI yang baru adalah Piala Dunia U-20 2021, mengingat Indonesia terpilih sebagai tuan rumah. Kata dia, semua harus disiapkan secara matang.
"Program ke depan yang pertama sesuai road map PSSI yang sudah dilakukan, saya lihat laporan dari sekjen sudah cukup bagus dan dalam trek," kata Cucu Sumantri, Kamis (2/11/2019).
"Hanya kita memoles saja dalam waktu dekat ini, karena mendapatkan tantangan sebagai tuan rumah Piala Dunia U-20," imbuh perwira TNI berpangkat Mayor Jenderal tersebut.
Cucu Sumantri terpilih menjadi Waketum PSSI setelah mengumpulkan suara terbanyak dalam Kongres Luar Biasa (KLB) PSSI di Shangri-La Hotel, Jakarta. Dia mendapatkan total 81 suara.
Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters.
text:
2021 U-20 World Cup Becomes the Challenge of the New PSSI Board
02 Nov 2019, 19:55 by Bola.net
Bola.net - The elected PSSI Deputy Chairperson, Cucu Sumantri, revealed a number of programs that will be carried out in the next four years. He said that everything remained based on the road map that had been prepared.
However, one of the challenges for the management of the new PSSI is the 2021 U-20 World Cup, considering that Indonesia was chosen as the host. He said, all must be prepared thoroughly.
"The first program in accordance with the PSSI road map that has been done, I see reports from the secretary general are quite good and on track," said Cucu Sumantri, Thursday (11/02/2019).
"Only we will polish it in the near future, because we will be challenged to host the U-20 World Cup," added the TNI officer with the rank of Major General.
Cucu Sumantri was selected as PSSI Waketum after collecting the most votes in the PSSI Extraordinary Congress (KLB) at Shangri-La Hotel, Jakarta. He got a total of 81 votes.
Scroll down for more information, Bolaneters.
